# CFBundleDisplayName

**Property List Key**

The user-visible name for the bundle, used by Siri and visible on the iOS Home screen.

## Discussion

Use this key if you want a product name that’s longer than [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/CFBundleName].

## Naming

- **CFBundleName**: A user-visible short name for the bundle.
- **CFBundleSpokenName**: A replacement for the app name in text-to-speech operations.
